Convergence¶

class convtrack.convergence.Convergence(incar: str, poscar: str, potcar: str, max_size: int, root_dir: str, kpoints: str = None, uniform_supercell: bool = True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods Summary

create_calculations()

Creates the actual Calculation objects, and lets them create their subfolders.

create_directory_skeleton(root_dir)

Sets up a calculation in a root dir, setting self.root_dir if it hasn’t been set before.
